Cropcircle

A mobile prototype for peer-to-peer sharing of locally grown food.

Project:

Sourcing locally produced food at an affordable price can be challenging. Why not work with your neighbors? I envisioned a mobile platform to facilitate this process: a local, peer-to-peer economy that allows people to trade food grown in urban gardens.

Tools used:

  • Pen and paper
  • Omnigraffle
  • Photoshop
  • Axure RP
